title: What is eSIM? Does Pixel 3a have eSIM?
content:
Hi.
I own a Pixel 3a.
I'm thinking of getting a second same for the phone. and I noticed there is something called eSIM. What is it? And how do I get one for Jio? Also, how much device performance is effected with two seems enabled? 

PS:I apologize if this is the wrong place to ask this question.
